      • onKeyEvent

        protected boolean onKeyEvent(int keyCode,
                             int repeatCount,
                             int eventType)
        Called from native thread. Override this method to respond to key events.
        パラメータ:
        keyCode - One of KeyCode constant values.
        repeatCount - Repeat count.
        eventType - One of KeyEventType constant values.
        戻り値:
        If event was consumed, return true. Otherwise false.
